validateCredentials(String, String, String) - Method in class controller.UserController
Calls for registration validation
validatePassword(String, String) - Method in class model.UserCredentialHandler
Validates the password
validatePasswordChange(String, String, String) - Method in class controller.UserController
Asks the UserCredentialHandler to validate the user input for password change If input is valid, asks the UserCredentialHandler to change the users password If input is not valid, gets an error message from UserCredentialHandler
validatePassWordChange(String, String, String) - Method in class model.UserCredentialHandler
Validates if 1. the old password given as input matches the users password 2. the new password given as input is valid for use 3. the new password and repeated new password match with one another
validateUserCredentials(String, String, String) - Method in class model.UserCredentialHandler
Validates the user credentials which user has given in the registration view.
